mapper.select: SELECT SUM(total_price) FROM order_code WHERE order_time >= CURRENT_DATE and order_time < CURRENT_DATE+1
SELECT SUM(total_price) FROM order_code WHERE SUBSTRING(CURRENT_DATE::text, 6,2)=SUBSTRING(order_time::text, 6,2);
SELECT SUM(total_price) FROM order_code WHERE SUBSTRING(CURRENT_DATE::text, 1,4)=SUBSTRING(order_time::text, 1,4);

with order_sales as( select order_time::date, substring(order_time::date::text, 1,7) as year_month, sum(total_price) as total_price from order_code group by order_time::date ) select *, sum(total_price) over(partition by year_month order by order_time::date rows unbounded preceding) from order_sales order by order_time::date

with order_sales as( select order_time::date, substring(order_time::date::text, 1,7) as year_month, sum(total_price) as total_price from order_code where order_time::date BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') group by order_time::date ) select *, sum(total_price) over(partition by year_month order by order_time::date rows unbounded preceding) from order_sales order by order_time::date
